title: Series and parallel circuits
brief_description: This film explains the relationship between resistance, current, and voltage in both series circuits and parallel circuits. The advantages and disadvantages of each type of circuit is vividly demonstrated; typical problems are presented; and a simple series-parallel combination is illustrated and explained.
